question: Who has become the first-ever Indian athlete to won the ITTF Breakthrough Star award?
explanation: Manika Batra has become the first-ever Indian athlete to be decorated with the  Breakthrough Table Tennis  Star award at the prestigious 2018 ITTF Star Awards in Incheon, South Korea on   December 12. Batra won four medals at the 2018 Commonwealth Games and a bronze at the 2018 Asian Games.
